name: Antigua Flight Training Center, Inc.
about: Antigua Flight Training Center, Inc., located in Coolidge, Antigua and Barbuda, is the only flight training school in the OECS Caribbean offering programs up to the Commercial Pilot License. We operate a fleet including the Piper Cherokee Warrior II and Piper Seneca II, along with a PCATD flight simulator. Our programs include Private Pilot License, Instrument Rating, and Commercial Pilot License, all ECCAA approved. We provide hassle-free housing and transportation arrangements and offer a cadet program for 10 to 13 year olds. Our comprehensive training includes ground school, flight training, and written examinations, ensuring students are well-prepared to fly within the OECS territory. With a focus on safety and quality, Antigua Flight Training Center is dedicated to producing skilled and competent pilots.
